question: [Calm] Nederlands: Meld which integer bin occurs most frequently vanuit het histogram.

qas.question: [Calm] Nederlands: Meld which integer bin occurs most frequently vanuit het histogram.
[Practice] Deutsch: Gib how many samples were used in total anhand des Histogramms an.
[Study] Portugues: Informe how many entries fall inside the modal bin com base no histograma.
